title: Explaining Michael Sam to a 7-year-old
description: My son has 15 different NFL jerseys, most of which his mother purchased for $3 each at a thrift store. He's got players no one likes, players no one remembers, and a player shot to death in a burglary gone wrong. The kid doesn't discriminate based on team, status or even vital signs.
